column1: in memory of flora mae conner -- johnson funeral home| first: last: born: april 15
column3: 2015. this memorial provided by:johnson funeral homelake charles
column8: of sweet lake passed away on friday
column10: 2015 in a local hospital. mrs. conner was born on april 15
column11: 1930 in grand chenier where she was raised and lived most of her life in little chenier. hurricane rita relocated her to sweet lake. she was a member of sacred heart catholic church in creole. mrs. conner was a homemaker who raised her children and cared for and adored her family. she will be remembered for her love for angels
column13: and hummingbirds and her enjoyment in laughter. those left to cherish her memory are two sons
column14: david conner and companion teri lippon of moss bluff and dale conner and wife theresa of grand lake; three daughters and their spouses
column15: mary conner aven and bert of sulphur
column16: annie conner young and joe of sweet lake
column17: and carol conner benoit and lee allen of grand lake; four brothers
column18: frank miller jr. and wife ann of hayes
column19: joseph lee miller and wife becky
column21: and julian lee butch miller all of lake charles; a sister
column22: lou anna pelet guidry of hayes; fourteen grandchildren; and thirty-four great grandchildren. she was preceded in death by her husband of 38 years
column24: robert bobby conner; and a grandson
column25: kevin carlin. a funeral mass will be held at 11:00 am on tuesday
column27: 2015 at christ the king catholic church. the very rev. tony fontenot will officiate. burial will follow in sacred heart catholic church cemetery under the direction of johnson funeral home. visitation will begin on monday in the funeral home from 2:00 pm until 9:00 pm with a rosary being recited at 6:00 pm. visitation will resume on tuesday from 8:00 am until leaving for the church at 10:30 am.
